santu nand wrote:

> I need an urgent help.I want to know whether the Junit Framework has 
> testListener interface.Please let me where i will get the 
> 'testlistener.java' if it is there.I tryed with 2.1 and 3.8.1 and 
> couldn't get it.

There is a TestListener interface in JUnit and it should be easy to find 
in the source JAR file (src.jar).
